title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Burrow on Week 3 Pressure, Micah Parsons Impact
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Joe Burrow on Week 3 Pressure, Micah Parsons Impact
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains the difference between roster building for coastal and Rust Belt NFL teams, the biggest red flag from Nathaniel Hackett’s first two weeks as Broncos Head Coach, and what simple change to the transfer portal will make a huge difference.

Then, Bengals Quarterback Joe Burrow joins Colin to discuss why the NFL product is superior to college football (19:00), what positive signs he saw on offense in the second half of Cincy’s Week 2 loss to Dallas (20:00), why he’s confident they can bounce back from an 0-2 start (23:00), if there’s added pressure to win in Week 3 against the Jets (25:00), what separates Cowboys LB Micah Parsons from other players (27:00), why he doesn’t hesitate to speak out on social issues (31:00), how he avoids social media distractions (33:00), how his family reacts to negative criticism of him (35:00), and why he doesn’t feel smothered in Cincinnati (38:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
